title: Elizabeth's Betrayal
description: Elizabeth, a young girl who has been cursed with vampirism after being in the wrong place at the wrong time has turned from a sweet girl to a monster. She has found a victim for her plans in Jordan, but the more time they spend together, the more she finds herself falling for him. When she uses him as bait, she realizes what she has done, filled with remorse she is dragged away by a warlock from her past, Lorcan, who has plans to make her his wife. When all of their plans backfire, Elizabeth realizes after all of her selfish deeds she needs Jordan and Lorcan more than ever, but will they forgive her and more importantly, who will they choose to save? A novel filled with black magic, voodoo, warlocks, witches, Limnades and vampires, and a time where everyone believes that these people and creatures do not exist, will anyone be safe from this dark magic that humans had forgot?
author: Rebecca Weeks
